1087:3: tathāpi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ sarve samādhayo vyāptā iti|
1087:7: vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayitvā śamathaṃ ca vimucyate|| iti|
1087:9: śamathabalena svālambane cittam aprakampyaṃ bhavati nivātasthitapradīpavat|
1087:13: ata eva bhagavatā catvāryālambanavastūni yogināṃ nirdiṣṭāni|
1087:18: tatra śamathena yat sarvadharmapratibimbakaṃ buddhādirūpaṃ cādhimucyālambyate tena nirvikalpapratibimbakam ucyate|
1087:20: yathāśrutodgṛhītānāñca dharmāṇāṃ pratibimbakam adhimucyālambyata iti kṛtvā pratibimbakam ucyate|
1087:21: tad eva pratibimbakaṃ yadā vipaśyanayā vicārayati yogī tattvādhigamārthaṃ tadā savikalpapratibimbakam ucyate,
1087:23: tasyaiva ca pratibimbasya svabhāvaṃ nirūpayan yogī darpaṇāntargatasvamukha-pratibimbapratyavekṣaṇena svamukhagatavairūpyāṇāṃ viniścayavat,
1087:26: tadā vastuparyantatāvagamāt prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vastuparyantatālambanam ucyate|
1087:27: tato bhāvanāmārgeṇa pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣvoṣadhirasāyanopayogād iva krameṇa viśuddhataratamakṣaṇodayād āśrayaparāvṛttau satyām,
1087:28: āvaraṇa-prahāṇalakṣaṇa-kāryaparisamāptiryadā bhavati tadā buddhabhūmau tad eva jñānaṃ kāryapariniṣpattyālambanam ucyate|
1087:29: tad evam anena kiṃ darśitaṃ bhavati ?
1087:34: yastu te na sevate tasya naiva vastuparyantatādhigamo nāpi kāryapariniṣpattiriti|
1087:36: vipaśyanā bhūtapratyavekṣeti saṃkṣepād āryaratnameghādau bhagavatā śamathavipaśyanayorlakṣaṇam uktam|
1087:37: tatra yoginā śīlaviśuddhayādau śamathavipaśyanāsaṃbhāre sthitena sarvasattveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādya,
1087:39: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yogī bhāvanā-kāle sarvam itikaraṇiyaṃ parisamāpya kṛtamūtrapurīṣaḥ kaṇṭaka-svarādirahite mano'nukūle pradeśe sthitvā mayā sarvasattvā bodhimaṇḍe niṣpādayitavyā iti viniścayan,
1087:41: daśadigavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān pañcāṅgena praṇipatyāgrato buddhabodhisattvān pīṭhādau sthāpayitvā anyatra vā yathāvat tebhyaśca yathāruci pūjāstavanaṃ kṛtvā svapāpaṃ pradeśya,
1087:43: mṛdutarasukhāsane vairocanabhaṭṭārakabaddhaparyaṅkeṇa ardhaparyeṅkeṇa vā niṣadya nātyunmīlite nātinimīlite nāsikāgravinyaste cakṣuṣī kṛtvā,
1087:46: śiro nonnataṃ nāvanatam ekapārśve niścalaṃ sthāpayitavyam|
1087:50: āśvāsapraśvāsāstu na saśabdā nāpi śthūlā nāpi tvaritāḥ karaṇīyāḥ|
1087:51: kiṃ tvasaṃlakṣayamāṇāṃ mandaṃ mandamanābhogena yathā praviśeyurnirgaccheyurvā tathā karaṇiyam|
1087:52: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yogī yathādṛṣṭaśrute tathāgatavigrahe cittaṃ sthāpayitvā śamathaṃ niṣpādayet|
1087:53: tañca tathāgatavigraham uttaptakanakāvadātaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanālaṃkṛtaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyagataṃ nānāvidhairupāyaiḥ sattvārthaṃ kurvantaṃ prābandhikena manasikāreṇa tadguṇābhilāṣaṃ samupādāya layauddhatyādīn vyupaśamayya tāvad dhyāyed yāvat sphuṭataraṃ puro'vasthitamiva taṃ paśyet|
1087:54: tataḥ tasya tathāgatavigrahapratibimbakasyāgatigatiṃ nirūpayato vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati|
1087:56: yathedaṃ tathāgatavigrahapratibimbakaṃ na kutaścid āgataṃ nāpi kvacid gamiṣyati tiṣṭhadapi svabhāvaśūnyam ātmātmīyarahitaṃ tathā eva sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyā āgatigatirahitāḥ pratibimbopamāḥ,
1087:57: bhāvādirūparahitā iti vicāryoparatavicāreṇa nirjalpaikarase manasā tattvaṃ bhāvayan yāvadicchaṃ tiṣṭhet|
1087:61: tatra cittam upanibadhya layauddhatyādipraśamena śamathaṃ niṣpādayet|
1087:65: tatra bālā bhāvādigrahābhiniveśād viparyastadhiyaḥ saṃsāre paribhramanti|
1087:68: niṣpannaśamatho yogī tattvādhigamāya tato vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayet|
1087:82: tasmād alīkavibhrama evāyaṃ lokasya yadutāhaṃ mameti niścayaṃ pratipannasya|
1087:83: tato rūpiṇo'pi dharmān dharmanairātmyādhigamāya vicārayet-kim ete cittavyatirekeṇa paramārthasantaḥ sthitāḥ āhosviccittameva rūpādinirbhāsaṃ svapnāvasthāyāṃ pratibhāsavat pratibhāsata iti|
1087:89: aṇuśo vibhajati dravyaṃ na caiva rūpaṃ vikalpayet|
1087:91: tasyaivaṃ bhavati cittamevānādikālikavitatharūpādyabhiniveśavaśāt svapnopalabhyamānarūpādipratibhāsavad bālānāṃ bahiḥ vicchinnamiva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ khyāti|
1087:93: sa evaṃ cittameva sakaladharmaprajñaptiṃ niścitya tatra pratyavekṣya ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratyavekṣito bhavatīti cittasvabhāvamapi pratyavekṣate|
1087:96: yada hi alīkasvabhāvarūpādyākāropagraheṇa cittameva citrākāraṃ pratibhāsate,
1087:97: tadā'syāpi rūpādivat tadavyatirekāt satyatvaṃ kutra bhavet ?
1087:98: yathā citrākāratayā rūpādayo naikānekasvabhāvāstathā cittamapi tadavyatirekeṇa naikānekasvabhāvam|
1087:104: yenāpi cittena pratyavekṣate yogī tasyāpi svabhāvaṃ parīkṣamāṇo nopalabhate|
1087:105: tad evaṃ yatra yatrālambane yoginaścittaṃ prasaret tasya tasya svabhāvaṃ parīkṣamāṇo [tat svabhāvamapi nopalabhate] 'sau yada nopalabhate tadā sarvameva vastu vicārya kadalīskandhavad asāramavagamya,
1087:107: tato bhāvādivikalpoparatau sarvaprapañcavigatam ānimittaṃ yogaṃ pratilabhate|
1087:108: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe-“sa evam apakṣālakuśalaḥ sarvaprapañcavigamāya śūnyatābhāvanāyā yogamāpadyate|
1087:109: sa śūnyatābhāvanābahulo yeṣu yeṣu sthāneṣu cittaṃ prasarati cittamabhiramate tāni tāni sthānāni svabhāvataḥ parigaveṣamāṇaḥ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati [yat cittaṃ tadapi parīkṣamāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati] yenāpi cittena parīkṣate tad api svabhāvataḥ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati|
1087:112: yastu nopaparīkṣate tasya nāsti nirnimittatāyāṃ praveśa iti|
1087:113: sa evaṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvamupaparīkṣamāṇo yada nopalabhate,
1087:114: tadāstīti na vikalpayati nāstīti na vikalpayati|
1087:115: yo'sau nāstīti kalpyate tasya buddhau sarvadaivāpratibhāsanāt|
1087:116: yadi hi bhāvaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭo bhavet,
1087:118: yadā kālatraye'pi yoginā prajñayā nirūpayatā bhāvo nopalabdhaḥ tadā kasya pratiṣedhān nāstīti kalpayet|
1087:119: evamanye vikalpāstasya tadānīṃ na santi eva,
1087:124: prajñayā ca nirūpayataḥ sakalavastusvabhāvānupalambhāt prajñottaradhyāyī bhavati|
1087:128: anabhisaṃskārataḥ tad eva tattvaṃ sphuṭataram avadhārayan yogī tiṣṭheta|
1087:130: yadāntarā cittaṃ bahirdhā vikṣiptaṃ paśyet tadā tatsvabhāvapratyevekṣaṇena vikṣepaṃ praśamayya,
1087:135: atha styānamiddhābhibhavād yada pracāratayā līnaṃ cittaṃ paśyet,
1087:136: layābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā tadā pramodyavastu buddharūpādikamālokasaṃjñāṃ vā manasikṛtya layamupaśamayet,
1087:138: yadā tu jātyandhavad andhakārapraviṣṭapuruṣavad vinimīlitākṣavat sphuṭataraṃ tattvaṃ nāvadhārayed yogī,
1087:139: tadā tasya līnaṃ cittaṃ veditavyaṃ vipaśyanārahitaṃ ca|
1087:140: atha yathā pūrvānubhūtaviṣayaspṛhayā cittamantarā samuddhataṃ paśyed,
1087:143: tataḥ punaḥ tatraiva tattve cittānabhisaṃskāravāhitāyāṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta|
1087:144: yadā ca vikṣiptapuruṣavad vānaravad vā'navasthitavṛtti cittaṃ bhavet,
1087:146: atha yadā layauddhatyābhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhi sphuṭataraṃ tatraiva tattve cittam utpādyate tadābhogaśithilīkaraṇād upekṣaṇiyam|
1087:148: yadā ca vipaśyanā bhāvayet prajñātiriktatarā bhāvayet,
1087:149: tadā śamathasyālpatvāt pravātasthitapradipavat pracalatvāccittasya na sphuṭataraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ bhavet|
1087:151: śamathasyābhyādhikye middhāvaṣṭabadhapuruṣasyeva sphuṭataraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ na syāt|
1087:153: yadā samapravṛtte dve api bhavato yuganaddhavāhibalīvardadvayavat tadānabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tāvat sthātavyaṃ yāvat kāyacittapīḍā na bhavet|
1087:154: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvasyaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti|
1087:173: tataḥ [śraddhādayaḥ kausīdyaprahāṇāya bhavanti] tadartha te bhāvanīyāḥ|
1087:177: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tu anābhogadoṣaḥ tatastatpratipakṣeṇa cetanā bhāvanīyā|
1087:184: līne'pi citte sati yadyābhogo na kriyate,
1087:190: tato yāvadiccha yogī tāvad anabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tattvaṃ bhāvayaṃstiṣṭhet|
1087:191: satyāṃ tu kāyādipīḍāyāṃ punaḥ punarantarā sakalameva lokaṃ vyavalokyamāyājala candropamapratibhāsaṃ [vata] avataret|
1087:196: evaṃvidhaṃ dharmagāmbhoryam anavagacchanto'mī bālabuddhaya ādiśānteṣveva dharmeṣu bhāvādisamāropaviparyastā vividhakarmakleśān upacinvanti|
1087:198: tato'haṃ kariṣyāmi yathaitān evaṃvidhaṃ dharmāgāmbhīryam avabodhayeyam iti,
1087:199: tato viśramya punarapi tathaiva sarvadharmanirābhāsaṃ samādhimavataret|
1087:202: evam anena krameṇa ghaṭikām [arthapraharam] ekapraharaṃ vā yāvantaṃ kālaṃ śaknoti tāvantaṃ kālaṃ tiṣṭhet|
1087:203: tata icchayā samādheḥ utthātuṃ paryaṅkam abhittvaivam anuvicintayet|
1087:204: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ sarva eva paramārthato'nutpannāstathāpi māyavat pratiniyatavividhahetupratyayasāmagrīvaśena vicitrā evāvicāraramaṇīyāḥ pravartante,
1087:209: tatra ye prajñācakṣurvikalatayā viparyastamatayā ātmābhiniviṣṭā vividhāni karmāṇi kurvanti te saṃsāre paribhramanti|
1087:210: ye punarekāntena saṃsāravimukhā mahākāruṇyavikalatayā ca na [sattvārthaṃ] dānādipāramitāḥ paripūrayanti ātmānaṃ damayanti te sattvā upāyavikalatayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhau patanti|
1087:211: ye tu asvabhāvaṃ jagad avagamya mahākāruṇyabalena sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇakṛtaniścayā māyākāravad aviparyastadhiyo vipulapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraṃ samupāyanti te tathāgataṃ padaṃ prāpyāsaṃsāramaśeṣasya jagataḥ sarvākāraṃ hitasukhāni saṃpādayantaḥ tiṣṭhanti|
1087:212: te ca jñāna [sambhāra] balena [samasta] kleśaprahāṇān na saṃsāre patanti sarvasattvāpekṣayā ca samupārjitavipulāprameyapuṇyasaṃbhāravaśena na nirvāṇe patanti,
1087:217: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyasambhāre jñānasaṃbhāre ca sarvadā'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ“ iti|
1087:218: āryatathāgatotpattisaṃbhasūtre coktam-“sa khalu punareṣa tathāgatānāṃ saṃbhavo naikena kāraṇena bhavati|
1087:222: āryavimalakīrtinirdeśe coktam-“śatapuṇyanirjātāḥ sarvakuśaladharmanirjātā apramāṇakuśalamūlakarmanirjātāḥ kāyāstathāgatasyeti“ vistaraḥ|
1087:223: tad evaṃ kṛtvā śanaiḥ paryaṅkaṃ bhittvā daśadigvyavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān praṇipatya tebhyaśca pūjāstotropahāraṃ kṛtvāryabhadracaryādipraṇidhānaṃ pranidadhīta|
1087:227: ye punarna kiñciccintayanti nāpi kiñcit karma kurvanti te parimucyante saṃsārāt|
1087:232: mahāyānamūlatvācca sarvayānānāṃ tatpratikṣepeṇa sarvam eva yānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ syāt|
1087:233: tathā hi 'na kiñciccintayitavyamiti' bruvata bhutapratyavekṣālakṣaṇā prajñā pratikṣiptā bhavet|
1087:234: bhūtapratyavekṣā-mūlatvāt samyagjñānasya tatpratikṣepā llokottarāpi prajñā pratikṣiptā bhavet|
1087:236: nāpi dānādicaryā kartavyeti vadatā copāyo dānādiḥ sphuṭatarameva pratikṣiptaḥ|
1087:237: etāvad eva ca saṃkṣiptaṃ mahāyānaṃ yaduta prajñopāyaśca|
1087:241: “ āryatathāgataguhyasūtre coktam-“imau ca prajñopāyau bodhisattvānāṃ sarvapāramitāsaṃgrahāya saṃvartete“ iti|
1087:242: tataśca mahāyānaṃ pratikṣipatā mahat karmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt|
1087:246: ] asyānupāsitavidvajjanasyānavadhārita-tathāgata-pravacananīteḥ svayaṃ vinaṣṭasya parān api nāśayato yuktyāgamadūṣitatvāt,
1087:247: viṣasaṃsṛṣṭavacanaṃ saviṣabhojanamiva ātmakāmena dhīmatā dūrata eva parihartavyam|
1087:248: tathā hyanena bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ pratikṣipatā dharmapravicayākhyaṃ pradhānam eva bodhyaṅgaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ syāt|
1087:249: vinā ca mūtapratyavekṣayā yoginaḥ katham anādikālābhyastarūpādibhāvābhiniveśasya cittaṃ nirvikalpatāṃ praviśet ?
1087:252: na hi vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayānubhūyamāneṣvapi sarvadharmeṣvasmṛtiramanasikāro vā śakyate kartum|
1087:253: yadi ca nāmāmī dharmā mayā'smartavyā nāpi manasikartavyā ityevaṃ bhāvayannasmṛtimanasikārau teṣu bhāvayet tadā sutarām eva tena te smṛtā manasikṛtāśca syuḥ|
1087:255: tadā tayorabhāvaḥ kena prakāreṇa bhavatīti etad eva vicāryate|
1087:259: na ca bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ vinā'nya upāyo'sti yena prakāreṇāsmṛtyamanasikārau kuryāt|
1087:261: vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā niḥsvabhāvatā dharmāṇāṃ katham avagatā bhavet ?
1087:262: na hi svabhāvata evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyāḥ sthitā ityevaṃ vinā tatpratyavekṣayā tacchūnyatāprativedho bhavet|
1087:263: nāpi vinā śūnyatāprativedhena āvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ saṃbhavati sarvatra sarveṣāṃ muktiprasaṅgāt|
1087:264: kiṃ ca tasya yogino yadi sarvadharmeṣu muṣitasmṛtitayā mūḍhatayā vā smṛtimanasikārau na pravartete,
1087:266: vinā ca bhūtapratyavekṣayā tatrāsmṛtim amanasikāraṃ cābhyastatā moha evābhyasto bhavet|
1087:269: tadā kathaṃ tatrāsmaraṇam amanasikāraṃ kartu śaknuyād vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā|
1087:271: paśyan eva na paśyatīti yuktam abhidhātum|
1087:274: na hyuṣṇaviruddhaṃ śītam āsevamānasya uṣṇasparśasaṃvedanaṃ bhavet|
1087:275: kiṃ ca samādhisamāpannasya yogino yadi manovijñānam asti,
1087:277: na hi pṛthagjanānāṃ sahasā nirālambanaṃ jñānaṃ bhavet|
1087:278: atha nāsti, tadā kathaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā dharmāṇāmavagatā bhavet ?
1087:280: na ca caturthadhyānālābhinaḥ pṛthagjanasya cittanirodhaḥ saṃbhavati|
1087:281: tasmāt saddharme yāvasmṛtyamanasikārau paṭhitau tau bhūtapratyavekṣāpūrvākau draṣṭavyau|
1087:283: tathā hi yadā nirūpayan samyakprajñayā yogī kālatraye paramārthataḥ samutpannaṃ na kaṃcid dharma paśyati,
1087:285: yo hi kālatraye'pyasattvān nānubhūtaḥ paramārthataḥ sa kathaṃ smaryeta,
1087:287: tato'sau sarvaprapañcopaśamaṃ nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ praviṣṭo bhavet|
1087:288: tatpraveśācca śūnyatāṃ pratividhyati tatprativedhācca prahīṇasakalakudṛṣṭijālo bhavati|
1087:291: tasmānna vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā samyagjñānodayo nāpi kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇām|
1087:292: tathā coktaṃ mañjuśrīvikurvitasūtre-“kathaṃ dārike bodhisattvo vijitasaṃgrāmo bhavati?
1087:293: āha, yo mañjuśrīḥ vicāya vicāya sarvadharmān nopalabhate“ iti|
1087:302: sutrasamuccaye coktam-“ātmanā vipaśyanāyogam anuyukto viharati parāṃśca vipaśyanāyāṃ nābhiyojayatīti mārakarmeti|
1087:304: āryaratnameghe ca-“vipaśyanāṃ nirūpayato niḥsvabhāvatāprativedhad animittapraveśa uktaḥ|
1087:309: tatra tatra sūtre yā bhagavatā nānāprakārā pratyavekṣā nirdiṣṭā sā virudhyate,
1087:311: tasmād evaṃ yuktaṃ vaktuṃ vayam alpaprajñā alpavīryāścana śaknumo bāhuśrutyaṃ paryeṣitumiti|
1087:312: na hi tatpratikṣepo yukto bhagavatā bahudhā bāhuśrutyasya varṇitatvāt|
1087:313: tat punarbrahmaparipṛcchāyām uktam-“ye tvacintyeṣu dharmeṣu [cintana] viprayuktāḥ teṣām ayoniśa iti|
1087:314: tatrāpi ye paramārthato'nutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādaṃ parikalpyānityaduḥkhadirūpeṇa śrāvakādivaccintāṃ prakurvanti,
1087:315: teṣāṃ samāropāpavādāntena cintāṃ pravartayatām ayoniśaḥ tad bhavatīti tatpratiṣedhāya yad uktaṃ na bhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ sa pratiṣedhaḥ tasyāḥ sarvasūtreṣvanujñānāt|
1087:316: tathā ca tatraiva brahmaparipṛcchāyām uktam-“cittaśūro bodhisattva āha-yaścittena sarvadharmāścintayati tatra cākṣato'nupahataḥ sa tenocyate bodhisattvaḥ“ iti|
1087:319: punaḥ tatraivoktam-“matimantaśca te bhaviṣyanti yoniśo dharmān pratyavekṣaṇatayeti“|
1087:320: punaḥ tatraivoktam-“pravicinvanti te dharmān yathā māyāmarīciketi“|
1087:322: tatra tatra śrutacintāmātreṇaiva tattvādhigamaṃ ye manyante,
1087:328: kiñca yad eva śrutacintāmayyā prajñayā viditaṃ tad eva bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā bhāvanīyaṃ nānyat|
1087:331: yadi nāmāsau vikalpasvabhāvātathāpi yoniśo manasikārasvabhāvatvāt tato bhūta nirvikalpajñānodaya iti kṛtvā tajjñānārthinā sā sevanīyā|
1087:334: kāṣṭhadvayanigharṣasaṃjātavanhinā tatkāṣṭhadvayadāhavat sāpi paścāt tenaiva dahyata evetyuktam āryaratnakūṭe|
1087:336: tatraivaivaṃ vadatā karmakṣayān muktirityājīvaka vādābhyupagamo bhavet|
1087:339: anādikālopacittasya hi karmaṇo na śakyate kṣayaḥ kartu tasyānantatvāt|
1087:340: apāyādiṣu ca tatphalaṃ bhuñjānasyāparasyāpi karmaṇaḥ prasūteḥ kleśeṣu cāvikaleṣu tatkaraṇatayā sthiteṣu karmaṇo niroddhum aśakyatvāt|
1087:342: na cāpi tasya vipaśyanāpavādinaḥ kleśakṣayaḥ saṃbhavatītyukta prāk|
1087:344: tadā kleśakṣayād eva muktiḥ sidhyatīti karmakṣaye tarhi vyarthaḥ śramaḥ|
1087:349: yad eva ātmādiviparyāsasamutthāpitam kuśalaṃ tad eva saṃsārāvāhakaṃ bhavati|
1087:351: tathā āryadaśabhūmake eta eva daśakuśalakarmapathāḥ pariṇāmanādipariśuddhiviśeṣeṇa śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvabuddhatvavāhakā bhavantīti nirdiṣṭam|
1087:353: sarvamahānadīnāṃ mahāsamudre praviṣṭānāṃ payaḥ skandhavad bodhisattvānāṃ nānāmukhopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñataikarasaṃ bhavati iti varṇitam|
1087:354: yā ca buddhabodhisattvānāṃ rūpakāyakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ prabhāparivāramahābhogatādisaṃpattiḥ dānādipuṇyasambhāraphalasattvena tatra tatra sūtre varṇitā bhagavatā sāpi virudhyate|
1087:357: kuśalakarmābhisaṃskāravaimukhye ca sati saṃsāravaimukhyaṃ sattvārthakriyāvaimukhyaṃ ca sevitaṃ bhavet|
1087:360: “ āryopāliparipṛcchādau ca-“saṃsāre vaimukhyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paradauḥśīlyamiti varṇitam|
1087:362: “ uktam āryavimalakīrtinirdeśe ca-“upāyād bhavati saṃsāragamanaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mokṣaḥ|
1087:368: “ sūtrasamuccaye ca-“asaṃskṛtaṃ ca pratyavekṣate saṃskṛtaiśca kuśalaiḥ parikhidyata iti mārakarma iti|
1087:369: bodhimārga prajānāti pāramitāmārga ca na paryeṣata iti mārakarmeti|
1087:370: “ yat punaḥ tatraivoktam-“dānacittābhiniveśād yāvat prajñācittābhiniveśāṃ mārakarmeti tatra na dānādināṃ sevāpratiṣedhaḥ kiṃ tvahaṃkāramamakāracittābhiniviṣṭasya grāhyagrāhakacittābhiniviṣṭasya caupalambhikasya yo viparītābhiniveśo dānādau tasya pratiṣedhaḥ|
1087:371: viparītābhiniveśasamuttthāpitā hi dānādayo'pariśuddhā bhavantīti kṛtvā mārakarmetyuktam|
1087:372: anyathā dhyānam api na sevanīyaṃ syāt|
1087:374: ata evaupalambhikasya sattvanānātvasaṃjñāyā yad dānādi tad apariśuddham iti pratipādanāya āryagaganagañje'pi-“sattvanānātva [viparītakarma] saṃjñino dānādi mārakarmetyuktam“|
1087:378: “ tatrāpyaupalambhikasya nānatvasaṃjñino viparītābhiniveśasamutthāpitā dānādayo'pi śuddhā bhavantīti etāvanmātraṃ pratipāditam|
1087:380: anyathā sarvasyaiva dānāderaviśeṣeṇa pratideśanā kṛtā syāt,
1087:382: yaccāpi brahmaparipṛcchāyām uktam-“yāvatī caryā sarvā parikalpyā|
1087:385: animittavihāre cānabhisaṃskāravāhinaḥ sthitasya bodhisattvasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati,
1087:387: sarveṣāṃ ca dānādīnāṃ paramārthato'nutpannatvaṃ ca paridīpitam,
1087:389: anyathā hi dīpaṅkarāvadāne ye buddhā bhagavatā paryupāsitā yeṣāṃ tu kalpamapi bhagavatā bhāṣamāṇena na śakyaṃ nāmaparikīrtnaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ caryāpratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ|
1087:390: dīpaṅkareṇāpi tadānīṃ bhagavataścaryāpratiṣedho na kṛta eva|
1087:391: kiṃ tu yadā śāntānimittavihāre'ṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau sthito'sau dṛṣṭastadāsau vyākṛto bhagavatā,
1087:393: sā cānimittavihāraparamatā bodhisattvānām aṣṭāmyāṃ bhūmau daśabhūmikairbuddhaiḥ pratiṣiddhā 'mā bhūd etad eva teṣāṃ parinirvāṇam' iti kṛtvā yadi tu sarvathā caryā na kartavyā bhavet pūrvoktaṃ sarva virudhyeta|
1087:394: yacca tatraiva brahmaparipṛcchāyām uktam-“dānaṃ ca dadāti taccāvipākābhikāṅkṣī,
1087:396: caturbhiḥ brahma ! dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā avaivarttikā bhavanti buddhadharmeṣu|
1087:398: nāpi mṛdvindriyeṇaiva caryā kartavyā na tu tīkṣṇendriyeṇeti yuktaṃ vaktum|
1087:399: yataḥ prathamāṃ bhūmimupādāya yāvaddaśamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānādicaryā utpadyate,
1087:400: na ca pariśiṣṭāsu na samudācaratīti vacanāt|
1087:405: nāpi ṣaṭpāramitādaśabhūmivyatirekeṇānyo bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo'sti yaḥ śīghrataravāhīsyāt|
1087:406: krameṇaiva ca cittasaṃtateḥ kanakaśuddhivat śuddhirbhavatīti sūtre varṇitam [āryalaṅkāvatāradaśabhūmikādau coktaṃ]-tathatāyāṃ yadā sthito bodhisattvo bhavati,
1087:408: tataḥ krameṇaiva pūrvabhūmīḥ pariśodhya tathāgatabhūmiṃ praviśatīti|
1087:409: ato nāsti bhūmipāramitāvyatirekeṇa [yugapat] buddhatvapurapraveśe anyanmukhaṃ nāpi bhagavatā kvacit sūtrādau deśitam|
1087:410: dhyāna eva ṣaṭpāramitāntargamāt tatsevanād eva sarvapāramitāḥ sevitā bhavantyato na dānādayaḥ [anyapāramitāḥ] pṛthak sevitavyā iti cet tad ayuktam|
1087:411: evaṃ hi buddhe gomayamaṇḍale'pi ṣaṭpāramitāntargamān maṇḍalakam eva kartavyaṃ syānna dhyānādyāḥ|
1087:412: śrāvakasyāpi nirodhasamādhisamāpannasya nimittād eva asamudācārāt tadā ṣaṭpāramitāparipūriprasaṅgaḥ|
1087:413: tataśca na śrāvakebhyo bodhisattvānāṃ bhedaḥ pratipādito bhavet|
1087:414: sarvāvasthāyām eva tu bodhisattvena ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayitavyā iti saṃdarśanārthe ekaikapāramitāntarbhāvaḥ sarvapāramitānāṃ bhagavatā sandarśitaḥ|
1087:416: tathā coktaṃ sarvadharmavaipulye-“yo'pyayaṃ maitreya ! ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisattvānāṃ saṃbodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti,
1087:423: maitreya āha-no hīdaṃ bhagavan ! bhagavān āha-yāni mayā maitreya ! bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlānyupacitāni|
1087:427: bhagavān āha-tvaṃ tāvad ajita ! ṣaṣṭikalpān dānāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ|
1087:430: ekanayenaiva bodhiryaduta śūnyatānayeneti te caryāpariśuddhā bhavanti“ ityādi|
1087:431: kevalaṃ śūnyātām eva sevamānāḥ śrāvakavannirvāṇe patanti|
1087:433: ata evācāryanāgārjunapādaiḥ sūtrasamuccaye'bhihitam-“na copāyakauśalarahitena bodhisattvena gambhīradharmatāyāmabhiyoktavyam“ iti|
1087:436: yuktayāgamopetaṃ tyaktvā bhagavadvacanaṃ ca parityajya anyasya mūrkhajanasya vacanaṃ prekṣāvatā grahītum ayuktam|
1087:437: āryaratnakūṭe ca-“sakaladānādikuśalopetatayā sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatā sevanīyetyuktaṃ na tu kevalā|
1087:438: “ āryaratnakūṭe coktam-tadyathā kāśyapāmātyasaṃgṛhītā rājānaḥ sarvakāryāṇi kurvanti evam eva upāyakauśalyasaṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya prajñā sarvabuddhakāryāṇi karoti|
1087:439: ata eva kevalāṃ śūnyatāṃ sevamānasya mā bhūnnirvāṇapraveśa iti|
1087:440: bhagavatā āryatathāgataguhyasūtre“ coktam-“naikāntanirālambanaṃ cittamātrasevanaṃ kartavyam api tu upāyakauśalyam api sevanīyam iti pradarśanārtham uktam-tadyathāpi nāma,
1087:449: śūnyatārambaṇaṃ ca pratyavekṣate sarvasattvamahākaruṇārambaṇaṃ ca prekṣate iti hi kulaputra ! upāyakuśalaḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddho bodhisattvo'nārambane vaśitāṃ pratilabhate“ iti vistaram uktvā punaśca vadatyevaṃ hi-“nāsti tat kiṃcid ārambaṇaṃ bodhisattvasya yat sarvajñajñānābhinirhārāya na saṃtiṣṭhate|
1087:451: ayaṃ bodhisattva upāyakuśala sarvadharmān bodhyanugatān paśyati|
1087:453: nāsti tat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yat sattvānām upabhogāya na syat|
1087:454: evam eva, kulaputra nāsti tat kiṃcid ārambaṇaṃ yad upāyakuśalo bodhisattvo bodhāya copakārībhūtaṃ na paśyati“ iti vistaraḥ|
1087:456: tatra yadi nāma svayaṃ na śakyate dānādidpuṇyasaṃbhāravīryam ārabdhuṃ tathāpi anyeṣām evam upadeśo dātuṃ na yuktaśceti svaparadrohaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt|
1087:457: tad evaṃ yuktyāgamābhyāṃ pratipāditaṃ yathā bodhisattvenāvaśyaṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā kartavyā sakaladānādipuṇyasambhāraścopārjayitavyaḥ|
1087:458: tataḥ prekṣāvatālpaśrutānām ābhimānikānāṃ vacanaṃ viṣam ivāvadhūyāryanāgārjunādividvajjanavacanāmṛtanugatena sakalasattveṣu mahakāruṇām upajanayya māyākāravad aviparyastenānuttarasaṃbodhipariṇāmitasakaladānādikuśalacaryāyām aśeṣajagaduddharaṇe cābhiyuktne abhāvitavyam|
1087:461: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato'sya saḥ||
1087:465: prajñām upāyaṃ ca satataṃ satkṛtyābhyasyataḥ krameṇa [cittaṃ] saṃtatiparipākād uttarottaraviśuddhataratamakṣaṇodayād bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamena sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sphuṭataraṃ dharmadhātvadhigamaṃ vimalaṃ niścalanivātadīpavallokottarajñānam utpadyate|
1087:469: tatastaduttarā bhūmīḥ pariśodhayan krameṇa kanakavad aśeṣāvaraṇāpagame sati asaktam apratihataṃ jñānaṃ pratilabhya buddhabhūmim aśeṣaguṇādhārāṃ prāpto bhavati|
1087:471: tasmād buddhatvādhigamārthinā madhyamapaddhatau tāvad abhiyogaḥ karaṇīya iti|
1087:472: prakāśya yat prāpi mayā śubham asamapaddhitam|
1087:475: vivecya gṛṇhanti subhāṣitāni haṃsāḥ payo yatpayasi prahṛṣṭāḥ||
